questions.question: How does the project address the selected priorities?
Please describe the motivation for your project and explain why it should be funded.
What are the objectives you would like to achieve and concrete results you would like to produce? How are these objectives linked to the priorities you have selected?
What makes your proposal innovative?
How is this project complementary to other initiatives already carried out by the participating organisations?
How does the proposal bring added value at European level through results that would not be attained by activities carried out in a single country?
What needs do you want to address by implementing your project?
What are the target groups of the project? How do the participating organisations engage with the project target groups in their activities?
How did you identify the needs of your partnership and those of your target groups?
How will this project address these needs?
How did you form your partnership? How does the mix of participating organisations complement each other and what will be the added value of their collaboration in the framework of the project?
What is the task allocation and how does it reflect the commitment and active contribution of all participating organisations?
Describe the mechanism for coordination and communication between the participating organisations
How are you going to assess if the project objectives have been achieved?

Explain how you will ensure the sustainability of the project: How will the participation in this project contribute to the development of the involved organisations in the long-term? How do you plan to continue using the project results or implement some of the activities after the project's end?
Please describe the impact of the project on the participating organisations and their target groups. How the outcomes will be integrated in their regular work?
Please describe the wider impact of the project on local, regional, national or European level relevant for the field of the application.
How will the progress, quality and achievement of project activities be monitored? Please give information about the involved staff, as well as the timing and frequency of the monitoring activities.
How will you ensure proper budget control and time management in your project?
What are your plans for handling risks for project implementation (e.g. delays, budget, conflicts, etc.)?
How will you ensure that the activities are designed in an accessible and inclusive way?
How does the project incorporate the use of digital tools and learning methods to complement the physical activities and to improve cooperation between partner organisations?
How does the project incorporate green practices in different project phases?
How does the project encourage participation and civic engagement in different project phases?
Objectives: What do you want to achieve by implementing the project?
Implementation: What activities are you going to implement?
Results: What project results and other outcomes do you expect your project to have?

work_packages.title: Work Packages
work_packages.description: Structured Work Packages defining the project implementation plan. WP0 covers project management and coordination (max 20% budget). Implementation WPs cover research, development, piloting, and dissemination activities.

wp_structure.title: Work Package title
wp_structure.activities: List of activities with title, description, and month range
wp_structure.deliverables: List of deliverables with code, title, type, and due month
wp_structure.participating_partners: All organisations contributing to this WP
wp_structure.budget_percentage: Percentage of total budget allocated to this WP

budget_breakdown.title: Budget Breakdown
budget_breakdown.description: Detailed budget allocation per Work Package and per partner, including cost categories and co-financing information. Management costs capped at 20%, implementation activities at least 60%, dissemination at least 5%.

budget_structure.total_grant: Total EU lump sum grant amount in EUR
budget_structure.per_work_package: Budget allocation per WP with cost categories (staff, travel, equipment, subcontracting, other)
budget_structure.per_partner: Budget allocation per partner with WP-level breakdown
budget_structure.co_financing: Co-financing narrative showing partner contributions beyond the EU grant

timeline.title: Project Timeline
timeline.description: Quarter-by-quarter project timeline derived from Work Packages, showing activities, milestones, and deliverables in chronological order.

timeline_structure.phase: Project phase name (Inception, Research, Development, Piloting, Dissemination)
timeline_structure.active_wps: List of active Work Package IDs
